subject: Basketball
Citizenship and Naturalization
Politics and Government
Immigration and Emigration
lead_paragraph: Though not a native Macedonian, Bo McCalebb is the fourth-leading scorer in the European championships and has created a surge of pride in the tiny country of two million people.
snippet: Though not a native Macedonian, Bo McCalebb is the fourth-leading scorer in the European championships and has created a surge of pride in the tiny country of two million people.
